title: Hussain Seraj
text: Hussain Seraj is a <a href="Kuwait">Kuwait</a>i <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="Forward%20%28association%20football%29">Forward</a> who played for <a href="Kuwait%20national%20football%20team">Kuwait</a> in the <a href="2004%20Asian%20Cup">2004 Asian Cup</a>. He also played for <a href="Al-Fahaheel%20FC">Al-Fahaheel FC</a>.
